name: A06- Asset Flip
description:
Controls:

: movement

: look

: change camera view from 1st person to 3rd person

: jump

Description:

For assignment 6, we were tasked with collecting and importing multiple assets from online sources. From the start, I knew I wanted to play with lighting, cameras and the terrain tools; so I decided to make a "playground" scene for my character, Roxy, that had kind of a retro and gloomy feeling. I imported the playground assets and modified the materials to fit the color palette I picked and created the ground terrain on Photoshop.

I also wanted to take this assignment a bit further and play with a camera switch script that would allow the game view to switch between first and third person.

There is no concrete objective to this game, just to walk around and explore the terrain! My favorite thing to do is climb the mountains by jumping-- finding a surprise at the highest mountain (spoiler: a flag). Another thing I enjoyed was walking into the slide off to the side of the mountain. 

Assets used:

  • Skybox: 
    • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/sci-fi/real-stars-skybox-l...
  • Roxy Character and animations:
    • https://www.mixamo.com/#/?page=1&query=amy
  • Playground and tree assets:
    • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/9t5-low-poly-playground-1025...
